title: Putin prepping 'prolonged conflict' beyond Donbas, could escalate nuclear threats: Top US intel official
content:
1. Putin prepping 'prolonged conflict' beyond Donbas, could escalate nuclear threats: Top US intel official  ABC News
  2. Top US spy chief says war in Ukraine will likely become 'more unpredictable and escalatory'  CNN
  3. National Intelligence Director Avril Haines Warns Vladimir Putin Could Take Extreme Steps to Win Ukraine War  The Daily Beast
  4. Putin could use nuclear weapon if he felt war being lost – US intelligence chief  The Guardian
  5. Pentagon: 'We don't have a clear picture' on what Putin will do next  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Putin prepping 'prolonged conflict' beyond Donbas, could escalate nuclear threats: Top US intel official  ABC News
Top US spy chief says war in Ukraine will likely become 'more unpredictable and escalatory'  CNN
National Intelligence Director Avril Haines Warns Vladimir Putin Could Take Extreme Steps to Win Ukraine War  The Daily Beast
Putin could use nuclear weapon if he felt war being lost – US intelligence chief  The Guardian
Pentagon: 'We don't have a clear picture' on what Putin will do next  CNN

localize.title: プーチンはドンバス以遠の「紛争の長期化」を準備中、核の脅威をエスカレートさせる可能性もある。米情報当局トップ
普京准备在顿巴斯以外地区进行 "长期冲突"，可能会升级核威胁。美国高级情报官员
普京準備在頓巴斯以外地區進行 "長期衝突"，可能會升級核威脅。美國高級情報官員
